GameBoard - Class in tron
The GameBoard class represents the main game board for the TRON Light-Cycle Battle game.
GameBoard(String, String, Color, Color, JLabel, GameController) - Constructor for class tron.GameBoard
Constructs a GameBoard instance.
GameBoardWithCentralCrossHurdle - Class in tron
The GameBoardWithCentralCrossHurdle class represents a game board for the TRON Light-Cycle Battle game that features a central cross-shaped hurdle.
GameBoardWithCentralCrossHurdle(String, String, Color, Color, JLabel, GameController) - Constructor for class tron.GameBoardWithCentralCrossHurdle
Constructs a new game board with a central cross hurdle.
GameBoardWithFourCorners - Class in tron
The GameBoardWithFourCorners class represents a game board for the TRON Light-Cycle Battle game that features four rectangular hurdles, each positioned in a corner of the board.
GameBoardWithFourCorners(String, String, Color, Color, JLabel, GameController) - Constructor for class tron.GameBoardWithFourCorners
Constructs a new game board with four corner hurdles.
GameBoardWithHurdle - Class in tron
The GameBoardWithHurdle class represents a game board for the TRON Light-Cycle Battle game that includes a single rectangular hurdle placed in the center of the screen.
GameBoardWithHurdle(String, String, Color, Color, JLabel, GameController) - Constructor for class tron.GameBoardWithHurdle
Constructs a new game board with a single central hurdle.
GameBoardWithThreeSmallCircleHurdles - Class in tron
The GameBoardWithThreeSmallCircleHurdles class represents a game board with three small circular hurdles positioned at different locations on the screen.
GameBoardWithThreeSmallCircleHurdles(String, String, Color, Color, JLabel, GameController) - Constructor for class tron.GameBoardWithThreeSmallCircleHurdles
Constructs a new game board with three small circular hurdles.
GameBoardWithThreeVerticalHurdles - Class in tron
The GameBoardWithThreeVerticalHurdles class represents a game board with three vertical hurdles positioned across the width of the screen.
GameBoardWithThreeVerticalHurdles(String, String, Color, Color, JLabel, GameController) - Constructor for class tron.GameBoardWithThreeVerticalHurdles
Constructs a new game board with three vertical hurdles.
GameBoardWithTwoHurdles - Class in tron
The GameBoardWithTwoHurdles class represents a game board with two large hurdles positioned at equal distances from the center of the screen.
GameBoardWithTwoHurdles(String, String, Color, Color, JLabel, GameController) - Constructor for class tron.GameBoardWithTwoHurdles
Constructs a new game board with two hurdles.
GameBoardWithTwoParallelHurdles - Class in tron
The GameBoardWithTwoParallelHurdles class represents a game board with two parallel horizontal hurdles.
GameBoardWithTwoParallelHurdles(String, String, Color, Color, JLabel, GameController) - Constructor for class tron.GameBoardWithTwoParallelHurdles
Creates a new game board with two parallel horizontal hurdles.
GameBoardWithVisibleBoundary - Class in tron
The GameBoardWithVisibleBoundary class represents a game board with a thick, visible red boundary around the edges of the playable area.
GameBoardWithVisibleBoundary(String, String, Color, Color, JLabel, GameController) - Constructor for class tron.GameBoardWithVisibleBoundary
Creates a new game board with a visible boundary.
GameBoardWithZigZagHurdles - Class in tron
The GameBoardWithZigZagHurdles class represents a game board with a zigzag pattern of hurdles.
GameBoardWithZigZagHurdles(String, String, Color, Color, JLabel, GameController) - Constructor for class tron.GameBoardWithZigZagHurdles
Creates a new game board with zigzag hurdles.
GameController - Class in tron
The GameController class manages the overall flow of the TRON game.
GameController() - Constructor for class tron.GameController
Creates a new GameController and starts by displaying the welcome screen.
GameDrawArea - Class in tron
The GameDrawArea class handles the drawing of the game elements, including the motorcycles and their trails.
GameDrawArea(ArrayList<Motorcycle>) - Constructor for class tron.GameDrawArea
Creates a new GameDrawArea with the specified list of motorcycles.
getHighScores() - Method in class tron.HighScores
Retrieves the list of high scores, sorted in descending order.
getName() - Method in class tron.HighScore
Gets the name of the player.
getName() - Method in class tron.Motorcycle
Gets the name of the player controlling the motorcycle.
getScore() - Method in class tron.HighScore
Gets the score of the player.
getTrail() - Method in class tron.Motorcycle
Gets the trail of the motorcycle.
getX() - Method in class tron.Motorcycle
Gets the current x-coordinate of the motorcycle.
getY() - Method in class tron.Motorcycle
Gets the current y-coordinate of the motorcycle.
